SEARCH

Class Cpu

java.lang.Object
Cpu
public class Cpu extends Object
Represents the Central Processing Unit (CPU) in a computer system.

  • Constructor Summary

    Cpu()
    Default constructor for the CPU.

  • Constructor Details

    • Cpu

      public Cpu()
      Default constructor for the CPU. Initializes the Instruction register, toggle, Instruction counter, and General purpose register.

  • Method Details

    • getIR

      public char[] getIR()
      Getter for the instruction register.
      Returns:
      the whole array of the instruction register.

    • getIR

      public int getIR(int index)
      Getter for a specific index of the instruction register.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the instruction register array.
      Returns:
      the value at the specified index of the instruction register.

    • setIR

      public void setIR(char[] IR)
      Setter for the instruction register.
      Parameters:
      IR - the new value for the instruction register.

      Returns:
      the value of the toggle.

      Parameters:

    • getOpcode

      public String getOpcode()
      Getter for the opcode, which is the first two bytes of the instruction register.
      Returns:
      the opcode, which can be GD, PD, SR, LR, BT, H, CR.

    • getOperand

      public int getOperand()
      Getter for the operand, which is the next 2 bytes of the instruction register (usually the memory location).
      Returns:
      the operand as an integer.
